name: zulip
description: Zulip is a self-hosted team chat platform with threaded conversations, topic-based streams, and extensive integrations. It offers web, desktop, and mobile clients, plus a fully managed cloud service for organizations.
features: Threaded conversations: Organize discussions by topic within streams to maintain context and reduce noise.
Stream organization: Create public or private streams for teams, projects, or topics with granular permissions.
Powerful search: Find messages across all conversations with full-text search including filters for streams and topics.
Rich formatting: Compose messages with Markdown, code blocks, LaTeX math, and emoji for expressive communication.
Integrations: Connect with GitHub, Jira, Jenkins, and hundreds of other services using webhooks and bots.
Mobile apps: Access conversations from native iOS and Android apps with full feature parity to the web client.
Desktop clients: Use dedicated desktop applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux with native notifications.
Email integration: Receive message notifications via email and reply directly from your inbox.
Video calls: Start video meetings with integrated Jitsi or BigBlueButton support directly from conversations.
Guest access: Invite external collaborators with limited access to specific streams without full organization membership.
Message editing: Edit sent messages with visible edit history to correct mistakes while maintaining transparency.
Custom emoji: Upload and use custom emoji reactions to add personality and team culture to conversations.
